title: 165. Gabriel Bergmoser: The Hunted
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Author and screen writer Gabriel Bergmoser chats to Dani Vee about his novel The Hunted published by Harper Collins. A thrilling and terrifying book that doesn't hold back. The conversation covers Australian culture, toxic masculinity, moral ambiguity and what it means to be good. We also discuss the classics. Join the conversation.

description: Author and screen writer Gabriel Bergmoser chats to Dani Vee about his novel The Hunted published by Harper Collins. A thrilling and terrifying book that doesn't hold back. The conversation covers Australian culture, toxic masculinity, moral ambiguity and what it means to be good. We also discuss the classics. Join the conversation.
